sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-app>
    <v-main>
      <v-container>
        <v-form ref="form" v-model="valid" lazy-validation>
          <v-text-field
            v-model="email"
            :rules="emailRules"
            label="E-mail"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
          <v-text-field
            v-model="password"
            :rules="passwordRules"
            label="Password"
            type="password"
            required
          ></v-text-field>
          <v-btn :disabled="!valid" @click="submit">Login</v-btn>
        </v-form>
      </v-container>
    </v-main>
  </v-app>
</template>

<script>
export default {
  data() {
    return {
      valid: true,
      email: "",
      emailRules: [
        (v) => !!v || "E-mail is required",
        (v) => /.+@.+\..+/.test(v) || "E-mail must be valid",
      ],
      password: "",
      passwordRules: [(v) => !!v || "Password is required"],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    submit() {
      if (this.$refs.form.validate()) {
        // Handle form submission
        console.log("Form submitted:", {
          email: this.email,
          password: this.password,
        });
      }
    },
  },
};
</script>

<style scoped>
/* Add any scoped styles here */
</style>
